programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E23 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura and Steven are a young couple with an expanding family, and are ready to take the next steps in home ownership. They want a large plot of land for their young children to run around and enjoy nature, and a spacious home that reflects this new phase of their life. Steve Bailey is the man for the job, and with such great homes to choose from, Laura and Steve will be hard pressed to pick just one!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E24 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura and Steven are a young couple with an expanding family, and are ready to take the next steps in home ownership. They want a large plot of land for their young children to run around and enjoy nature, and a spacious home that reflects this new phase of their life. Steve Bailey is the man for the job, and with such great homes to choose from, Laura and Steve will be hard pressed to pick just one!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E25 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads back to Belize to help husband and wife team Rachel and Ben size up some resort properties. Along with their investors, Rachel and Ben are looking to purchase a resort on the island of Ambergris Caye that will provide the most bang for their buck. Each with a big personality of their own, it becomes clear this couple is not going to see eye to eye on what they want. Luckily for them, Sofie is a pro at mediating conflicts when it comes to real estate.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E26 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads back to Belize to help husband and wife team Rachel and Ben size up some resort properties. Along with their investors, Rachel and Ben are looking to purchase a resort on the island of Ambergris Caye that will provide the most bang for their buck. Each with a big personality of their own, it becomes clear this couple is not going to see eye to eye on what they want. Luckily for them, Sofie is a pro at mediating conflicts when it comes to real estate.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Julie and James are looking for a new home to raise their two boys. James is in the tech industry and would love an energy efficient home. Julie has her own dance studio and can't wait to get back to work after giving birth to her second son. Eve and Shawn are the perfect team for the job, especially with Timberworx's cutting edge "Net-Zero" project.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Giulia and Scott have recently come into an inheritance and want the house of their dreams. Currently, they live in a modest bungalow in a busy neighbourhood but would prefer to live in a secluded house with a magnificent view. Ideally, Giulia also wants a house that has separate living quarters for her ageing parents.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Kevin is a retired, successful businessman. He is a single dad to Shannon and Jennifer. Shannon has been accepted into the Ontario Veterinarian College at the University of Guelph, which is Canada's leading program in veterinary health care. This is the reason they are moving to Guelph. Kevin is happy to live anywhere as long as it has excellent golf courses. Eve will be glad to tell him that Guelph just happens to have 3 of the top ones in Ontario.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura is on the hunt for a new home for long time clients Marino and Paula. The couple and their three kids would like a spacious house with a country feel to escape their hectic lifestyles. Due to Marino's busy schedule as a producer, he would prefer a house that is all-inclusive and turnkey. Their kids are very active want a pool and the option for horse stables. Laura's going to find them the perfect home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Louise, Jason, and their two children have been living in Europe for the past 10 years, but now they would like to be closer to their family in Canada. Louise absolutely adores the European aesthetic; the sense of luxury conveyed by multi-peaked roof-lines, bay-shaped windows, and decorative stone. She wants a house that allows them the feeling of "living abroad" without leaving the country.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Diogo is a dedicated musician working on his new album. He has been debating between moving to Miami or staying in Canada. Toronto is closer to his family and where he feels at home with his music. Danielle will show him some spectacular properties in both cities and see what he decides.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Elizabeth and Michael are retired and want to move closer to their kids and grandchildren. They want to downsize from their two-story house into a bungalow. Luckily, Eve knows all about luxury bungalows. Elizabeth loves to exercise and really would like a gym. Michael has a passion for cars and needs at least a three-car garage. Their current house is dated so they would love a house that is turnkey. Eve will do her best to find their forever home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Tomarra and Rob had just married and blended their two families. As a new family, they want to transition to a quiet neighbourhood away from the hustle and bustle of Toronto. Steve is up for the challenge. Rob is a writer and plans to work from home, while Tomarra is a naturopath who would love to have her own studio. Ultimately, they want to start cherishing the real things in life, and that is spending more time with their kids.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Darlene and Bruce are in the market for a new home and have enlisted Laura to help them out. Darlene's one request is that they stay close to their current home, where their daughter goes to school. For Bruce, quality construction materials and workmanship are of paramount importance. One thing the entire family agrees on is that the backyard should have a fantastic entertainment space since they spend plenty of time together outdoors and enjoy having guests over.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Kathryn and Neil are true urbanites. They love what downtown Toronto has to offer. When Neil found out his company was relocating to Guelph, they weren't thrilled. After five months of long commutes, the Thompson family is ready to take the risk and make a move-with some conditions. The new house has to have a pool and playroom for the kids and a large entertainment area for adults. Eve's challenge is to find them an enticing home that will convince their friends from the city to visit.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E11 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Ashley and Ali are ready to take their relationship and living situation to the next level. The young entrepreneurs are prepared to move into a house, but the one thing they can't agree on is where to live. Ashley wants an estate home outside the city that has an outdoor pool and beautifully manicured gardens. Ali, on the other hand, insists on being close to his downtown office and walking distance from restaurants and shops.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Stephanie is making a big move from BC to Guelph to be closer to her son John and his family. She doesn't want the move to be a hassle and is looking for an accessible, decent-sized home for her grandchildren and visitors from BC. Good sized guest rooms and a large backyard are a must. As she loves to cook, she would also like a new kitchen. Eve will show Stephanie 3 beautiful homes that fit the criteria. Stephanie is going to have a difficult decision.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E13 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Steve Bailey, Mike Donia and Daryl King review their favourite homes. Steve takes us down memory lane to his 18th century farmhouse, and another home with a stunning infinity pool. Daryl's listings range from King city to Caloden, with helicopter pads and sprawling backyards. Mike brings us back to his fabulous listings in Thailand. He shows us a home made entirely of Bamboo, and billion-dollar property.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: George is a retired basket ball player, and Mada is an international model. For a man over 7 feet tall, finding the perfect house might be a challenge. Danielle knows high ceilings come in all shapes and sizes, can she find a style they'll like? They also want a pool and a home theatre.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Suhail and Niki have busy schedules. He's a marketing director and she's a doctor so she's often on call for a hospital downtown. Can they find a place that can help relieve stress, but also be close enough to downtown for those urgent calls? They want a secluded home with at least 1 acre and magnificent views.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Wendy and Daniel are looking to downsize after their kids have moved out, but still want an elegant home. She's a physical therapist and she's a business analyst. They want something that can help them relax at the end of the day, with at least 4 bedrooms and away from the downtown core. Can Lou find them something that fits?

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Danielle is helping quite a pair, Joseph is a chiropractor and Nadia is an aerospace engineer. They're looking for a home to start a family. Not only that, they want space to host their extended family. Will it be as difficult as rocket science?

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Janelle and Manuel are young professionals looking for more space. With one child tagging along on the tour already, they need a place for their growing family. They might need to do some renovations, but they want everything to be perfect.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: These two business owners Joseph and Heather work hard and want to play hard! They're looking for a place to entertain guests, and Daryl's got some amazing homes to show them.

Each with a big personality of their own, it becomes clear this couple is not going to see eye to eye on what they want. Luckily for them, Sofie is a pro at mediating conflicts when it comes to real estate.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Julie and James are looking for a new home to raise their two boys. James is in the tech industry and would love an energy efficient home. Julie has her own dance studio and can't wait to get back to work after giving birth to her second son. Eve and Shawn are the perfect team for the job, especially with Timberworx's cutting edge "Net-Zero" project.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Giulia and Scott have recently come into an inheritance and want the house of their dreams. Currently, they live in a modest bungalow in a busy neighbourhood but would prefer to live in a secluded house with a magnificent view. Ideally, Giulia also wants a house that has separate living quarters for her ageing parents.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Kevin is a retired, successful businessman. He is a single dad to Shannon and Jennifer. Shannon has been accepted into the Ontario Veterinarian College at the University of Guelph, which is Canada's leading program in veterinary health care. This is the reason they are moving to Guelph. Kevin is happy to live anywhere as long as it has excellent golf courses. Eve will be glad to tell him that Guelph just happens to have 3 of the top ones in Ontario.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura is on the hunt for a new home for long time clients Marino and Paula. The couple and their three kids would like a spacious house with a country feel to escape their hectic lifestyles. Due to Marino's busy schedule as a producer, he would prefer a house that is all-inclusive and turnkey. Their kids are very active want a pool and the option for horse stables. Laura's going to find them the perfect home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Louise, Jason, and their two children have been living in Europe for the past 10 years, but now they would like to be closer to their family in Canada. Louise absolutely adores the European aesthetic; the sense of luxury conveyed by multi-peaked roof-lines, bay-shaped windows, and decorative stone. She wants a house that allows them the feeling of "living abroad" without leaving the country.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Diogo is a dedicated musician working on his new album. He has been debating between moving to Miami or staying in Canada. Toronto is closer to his family and where he feels at home with his music. Danielle will show him some spectacular properties in both cities and see what he decides.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Elizabeth and Michael are retired and want to move closer to their kids and grandchildren. They want to downsize from their two-story house into a bungalow. Luckily, Eve knows all about luxury bungalows. Elizabeth loves to exercise and really would like a gym. Michael has a passion for cars and needs at least a three-car garage. Their current house is dated so they would love a house that is turnkey. Eve will do her best to find their forever home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Tomarra and Rob had just married and blended their two families. As a new family, they want to transition to a quiet neighbourhood away from the hustle and bustle of Toronto. Steve is up for the challenge. Rob is a writer and plans to work from home, while Tomarra is a naturopath who would love to have her own studio. Ultimately, they want to start cherishing the real things in life, and that is spending more time with their kids.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Darlene and Bruce are in the market for a new home and have enlisted Laura to help them out. Darlene's one request is that they stay close to their current home, where their daughter goes to school. For Bruce, quality construction materials and workmanship are of paramount importance. One thing the entire family agrees on is that the backyard should have a fantastic entertainment space since they spend plenty of time together outdoors and enjoy having guests over.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Kathryn and Neil are true urbanites. They love what downtown Toronto has to offer. When Neil found out his company was relocating to Guelph, they weren't thrilled. After five months of long commutes, the Thompson family is ready to take the risk and make a move-with some conditions. The new house has to have a pool and playroom for the kids and a large entertainment area for adults. Eve's challenge is to find them an enticing home that will convince their friends from the city to visit.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E11 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Ashley and Ali are ready to take their relationship and living situation to the next level. The young entrepreneurs are prepared to move into a house, but the one thing they can't agree on is where to live. Ashley wants an estate home outside the city that has an outdoor pool and beautifully manicured gardens. Ali, on the other hand, insists on being close to his downtown office and walking distance from restaurants and shops.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Stephanie is making a big move from BC to Guelph to be closer to her son John and his family. She doesn't want the move to be a hassle and is looking for an accessible, decent-sized home for her grandchildren and visitors from BC. Good sized guest rooms and a large backyard are a must. As she loves to cook, she would also like a new kitchen. Eve will show Stephanie 3 beautiful homes that fit the criteria. Stephanie is going to have a difficult decision.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E13 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Steve Bailey, Mike Donia and Daryl King review their favourite homes. Steve takes us down memory lane to his 18th century farmhouse, and another home with a stunning infinity pool. Daryl's listings range from King city to Caloden, with helicopter pads and sprawling backyards. Mike brings us back to his fabulous listings in Thailand. He shows us a home made entirely of Bamboo, and billion-dollar property.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: George is a retired basket ball player, and Mada is an international model. For a man over 7 feet tall, finding the perfect house might be a challenge. Danielle knows high ceilings come in all shapes and sizes, can she find a style they'll like? They also want a pool and a home theatre.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Suhail and Niki have busy schedules. He's a marketing director and she's a doctor so she's often on call for a hospital downtown. Can they find a place that can help relieve stress, but also be close enough to downtown for those urgent calls? They want a secluded home with at least 1 acre and magnificent views.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Wendy and Daniel are looking to downsize after their kids have moved out, but still want an elegant home. She's a physical therapist and she's a business analyst. They want something that can help them relax at the end of the day, with at least 4 bedrooms and away from the downtown core. Can Lou find them something that fits?

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Danielle is helping quite a pair, Joseph is a chiropractor and Nadia is an aerospace engineer. They're looking for a home to start a family. Not only that, they want space to host their extended family. Will it be as difficult as rocket science?

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Janelle and Manuel are young professionals looking for more space. With one child tagging along on the tour already, they need a place for their growing family. They might need to do some renovations, but they want everything to be perfect.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: These two business owners Joseph and Heather work hard and want to play hard! They're looking for a place to entertain guests, and Daryl's got some amazing homes to show them.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S05 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vipin's family of four are in the market to purchase their own dream home in the Greater Toronto Area.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S05 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Phil and Aubree, a newly wed couple, are in the market to purchase a dream home in Castlemore.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: The King is back, baby! Daryl King is known to make an entrance, and he wants the houses he shows to have that same "wow" factor. His clients are looking for a grand mansion, and with their sizeable budget won't settle for anything less than spectacular.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Will Daryl be able to dazzle his clients and find a property that will take their breath away? This episode features the first two of four properties, with a special guest appearance by Design Generation builder and designer Carlo Rinomato.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: International luxury realtor Mike Donia jets off to Thailand to work with a client and good friend of his, Mae. She is moving back to her hometown of Bangkok to pursue her modeling career, and is looking for the house of her dreams. Mike has his work cut out for him, as Mae's long wish list will be hard to achieve with her budget.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of a Bangkok real estate expert, Max Gloeckner, Mike is confident he can deliver just what Mae is looking for. This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the client decides to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vicky is searching for a home in The Beaches for her and her family. No one knows the Beach like Inez Kudryk, so Vicky enlists her help in finding some stunning luxury properties to tour. With a grand budget and very particular tastes, Inez knows that Vicky will be a tough client to please.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Will Vicky find the forever home of her dreams? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase and special appearances by guest agent Jasmine Xuereb and mortgage broker Paul Meredith.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Steve Bailey to save the day! This week's episode features the lovely couple Chris and Rosa as they search for the perfect home. While Rosa is mainly concerned with cutting down her commute, Chris just wants to feel a connection to a property. Luckily for Steve, he's got his sister Helen, an interior designer and home stager, to help sway Chris - and it works!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Unfortunately for Rosa, she isn't seeing the benefits of moving to a town around Cambridge. Steve's got some neat ideas, but will they be able to convince Rosa? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads to the island of Ambergris Caye, Belize to help a friend and former client, actress and choreographer Zuzana Marosová. As a public figure, Zuzana craves privacy in her personal time and is looking for a relaxing space to unwind with her children.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of local realtor Daniel Hartin, Sofie sets her sights on the perfect home...and hopefully a bit of fun in the sun! This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the client decides to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E11 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Jessica and Mark are a young couple living and working in Thailand after meeting there several years ago and falling in love. They are looking for a permanent home in Bangkok, and after chatting with her friend Mae, Jessica knows that Mike Donia is the man for the job.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of local agents Max Gloeckner and Nala Gill, will Mike be able to find a place that suits the whole family? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E13 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: After helping them find a home last season, Inez is enlisted by Martin and Cheryl to help them find the perfect investment property. While Cheryl wants a property with minimal work and no landlord responsibilities, Martin is more open to renovations and taking on some of the commonplace duties associated with property management.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E14 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with special guest appearances by interior design expert Shelley Alexanian and guest agent Mo Loulou.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E15 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This week's episode features Cambridge realtor extraordinaire Steve Bailey as he helps couple Dan and Melinda search for the perfect home. It's a real battle of contemporary vs. traditional as Dan and Melinda hash it out over where their future lies. Melinda surprises Dan with some new information, but can Steve surprise them both by showing them the perfect property?

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E16 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with a special guest appearance by interior design expert Shelley Alexanian.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E17 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vancouver-based couple Jim and Shannon are looking to relocate to their hometown of Toronto with their two daughters. With a budget of 10 million dollars, they enlist the help of savvy realtor Sofie Kehdi. While it might first seem that Jim and Shannon are on the same page, the house hunt proves that they have some differing opinions on what makes a good investment.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E18 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with a special appearance by guest agent Tyrone N. Steer.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E19 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Off on another adventure! This episode takes Mike Donia on a whirlwind tour of Southeast Asia as he searches for a home for his clients, Antonio and Kim. Featuring properties in Thailand, Indonesia, and the Philippines, each country has its own unique charms to offer the would-be buyers. Monkeys, mangoes and mansions are in store for Mike as he continues his hunt for that perfect property.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man is arrested at a popular theme park for public intoxication. A detainee swallows his earring during processing. Officers attempt to restrain a combative woman in custody.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A high-priced escort is accused of skipping out on her limo tab. A ladies' man directs foul language at the jail nurse, and a seasoned prostitute considers getting into the sex-toy business.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man brought in for trespassing becomes violent. A sex worker admits she۪s witholding her pediculosis condition from clients. A woman explains her tattoos are a reminder of the women she loved.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man fresh out of prison tries to prove how tough he is. A drunk woman rages against everyone in her path. A couple’s wedding plans are ruined after officers find their stash of meth, and an arrest leaves an elderly gentleman singing the blues after being processed for a possession charge.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Las Vegas, NV a man who insists he paid for a speeding ticket becomes so incensed that he is placed in a restraining chair. In Sarasota, FL a belligerent man accuses officers of touching him inappropriately. In Portland, OR officers help a young mother and her kids.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Two agitated inmates are put in restraints to cool down. A suspected burglar expresses concern over a milk allergy, and an inmate becomes upset about the care given to her belongings.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S05 : E12 Throw in the Towel
programme.desc: A man arrested for domestic violence threatens to put all the officers in jail. Inmates on kitchen duty get into a fist fight over a dish towel. A woman unsure about her sexual identity is arrested for trespassing at a friend’s home. Officers find an unusual bit of clothing when a man is changed into a jail uniform.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man arrested on drug warrants is upset about the BBQ brisket he left on the grill. An intoxicated ladies' man flirts with the jail staff and an inmate finds it funny that he sold tree leaves as pot to an undercover officer. Brother turns on brother when a good deed gets mixed with alcohol. A man caught panhandling believes officers should arrest hardened criminals instead of him.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Salt Lake City, UT a man is sent to a holding cell after hurling racial insults. In Reno, NV A man outfitted in just his underwear is taken into custody for battery of a police officer. In Portland, OR an intoxicated eldery man breaks into song during booking.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Officers fear a man may attempt to hang himself and decide to intervene. A heavily injured man ends up in jail after taking cocaine and acid. Irascibility shadows a man with low blood sugar.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An angry man refuses to cooperate during the booking process. A man claims to be part of the “international police”.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A hysterical woman is transferred to an isolation cell. A woman shows her undying LA pride to the arresting officers. A young woman is put under observation for threatening harm to herself.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A cologne salesman boasts and promotes his "magic potion". A man bloodies his neighbor in a one-sided feud. Taking an illegal drug has an unexpected consequence to one man’s face. Open Booking becomes a stage as one woman launches her singing career.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Salt Lake City, UT a belligerent woman is restrained. In Portland, OR a repeat offender is placed in isolation for unruly behavior. In Las Vegas, NV a man opens up about how his friends and family feel about him in a holding cell. In Spokane, WA a man is jailed in an attempt to steal coffee for his friends.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S05 : E07 Old Habits Die Hard
programme.desc: An inmate demands that officers follow her instructions while in jail. A man insists that he has been kidnapped by the police and is being held illegally. An elderly man discovers that domestic violence does not have an age limit. A young woman makes the hard decision to turn herself in to change her life around.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Toting his guitar, an inmate serenades the officers. One man protests his arrest and states that having cocaine is not a crime. A man claims to be an Iraqi War Veteran and challenges his detainment.

programme.desc: A man on the corner is questioned when he’s wearing gang colors in a gang neighborhood. A muscle car spins its tires at a stop light. A woman’s neighbor steals her ‘special’ plants.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Police respond to an emergency call and find a man in dire trouble. Deputies respond to an abusive husband at a local eatery. Two women try to buy narcotics from an undercover deputy during a sting.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A high-speed pursuit ends in a foot chase. Stolen property is found in a suspect’s car during a traffic stop. An altercation ends with a brick being tossed at a victim’s car.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S22 : E26 Not a Momma's Boy
programme.desc: Officers are called to fight between a mother and her son. Officers respond to a man on a trolley hurling racial slurs at a passenger. A traffic stop uncovers narcotics in a young man’s trunk.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An extremely understanding cop gives a resistant suspect too many chances. A driver reminds us why we should never let a friend borrow our car. A man with a supped-up vehicle tells an awful lie to police.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers assist a bondsman after a fugitive and his girlfriend refuse to surrender. An officer pulls over a teen who attempts to ingest a bag of marijuana while the officer isn’t looking. An officer makes an arrest after the female suspect has an outstanding warrant.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S15 : E22 Barked Up The Wrong Tree
programme.desc: Following a brief slow-speed pursuit, the desperate driver flees on foot. An officer responds to an assault. A dog owner is informed of her dog's mayhem and given a citation.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: When officers approach, a suspect flees into a fast food restaurant. A driver takes his granny's wheels for a dangerous spin with cops in pursuit. Sheriffs catch up to a man who fled the scene of a possible domestic battery.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Police arrest a bicycling dealer and his client. Police respond to a call of an unhinged rottweiler. Officers arrest an inebriated man after they spot him grabbing a female bystander.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S13 : E19 One for the Road
programme.desc: A man crashes his vehicle after losing control while attempting to evade the police. An elderly woman with an outstanding DUI warrant is arrested for hit and run. Officers discover methamphetamine while investigating two suspicious vehicles on the side of the road.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Deputies tase a man who almost ran over a deputy with his truck. A man gives police false information after saving a boy who fell into a pool. A woman tries to buy drugs from an undercover officer.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A man runs from police claiming he heard a gunshot. A woman lays the blame on her boyfriend. Officers confront a man who refuses to come down from a roof.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S16 : E16 Can't Run from Motorola
programme.desc: A suspect attempts to discard drugs during a foot chase. A man fails to pull over for minor infraction and then bails out his car on foot. A man is arrested after being spotted in a drug transaction.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An officer is forced to subdue a suspect with his baton. A man asks deputies to give him back his drugs before taking him to jail. A man under the influence causes a disturbance at an apartment complex.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An inebriated man is arrested for peering through the window of a recovery center. After a foot chase, officers bring down a local felon. Police respond to a domestic dispute at a mobile home park.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers rescue a man from a rushing river. A suspect taunts officers during a slow-speed chase. Officers assist a rescue team with extraction from a car. An officer assists in an apartment fire.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Suspects lead Officers on a reckless car chase on residential streets. Police tend to a woman assaulted by her inebriated friend. A DWI suspect is found relieving himself in a public port-a-potty.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S16 : E23 Bad Day, Bad Luck
programme.desc: A man is questioned for assaulting a woman on a train. Surveillance captured a man burglarizing a casino. A father kicks his son out of the house after his drinking becomes problematic.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A suspicious man attempts to flee Police on foot and is later arrested for possession. Officers in New Jersey charge a garage owner with receiving stolen property. Officers arrest a man after witnesses report purse snatching.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Agents of the US Customs and Border Protection pursue a vehicle. Border agents spot two undocumented people while scanning train tracks. Airport Customs detains a man when agents suspect he might be carrying more than luggage.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A deputy pursues a man who fled from a traffic stop. A deputy chases a suspicious man leaving an apartment complex. Two men claim they are trying sell a bike during a traffic stop.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S26 : E10 Get Off My Roof
programme.desc: The K-9 unit responds when a gunman takes to the rooftops. A drug exchange goes awry when the dealer tries to ditch his stash. A pickup-driving drunk tries to play it off when he smashes his neighbor's parked car.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Deputies respond to a fight between a daughter’s boyfriend and her mother. A woman lights candles after an attempted break-in. Police respond when an evicted tenant tries to reenter his old apartment.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers coax a man off a large construction crane. An inebriated man is jailed for domestic abuse. A man is rescued from a flash flood, but his truck isn’t so lucky.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S24 : E15 All The World's Our Bedroom
programme.desc: Officers are called to remove a man sleeping in a parking spot at Wal-Mart. A free-spirited couple takes their relationship to their front lawn. A resident brings a knife to a meeting with his building property manager.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S24 : E08 You've Gotta Believe Me
programme.desc: A DWI suspect flees from police because he thinks they won’t believe his version of events. A suspect is stopped for jaywalking but when questioned she can’t keep still. A naive man leaves his car unattended for a moment.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: During a routine traffic stop, an Officer recognizes the passengers from a prior drug related arrest. A K-9 unit assists in the pursuit of a grand theft auto suspect who flees on foot. An arrest is made after a couple leaving a known drug house is pulled over and questioned.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A man is taken to jail in connection to reports of solicitation. Officers investigate a stolen Escalade. An officer reunites a mother and her 5-year-old son.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A couple gets into a fight with their in-laws when they attempt to take their baby on a 3am drive. Two suspects proclaim their innocence after walking away from a hit and run. A man is attacked by his roommate after he gets ‘too friendly’ with a woman in their home.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers respond to an armed robbery and carjacking, the suspects are arrested on several charges. A concerned sister reports a fight between her brother and a heavyset burglar. Officers pursue a stolen vehicle and a high speed chase ensues which ends in a wreck.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers pursue a truck after a donut shop robbery. Deputies are dispatched when a wife attacks her husband with an unknown object. Deputies respond to a mother and son knife fight.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S21 : E05 Dyed in the Wool
programme.desc: A suspect selling narcotics takes off on foot. A bank robber leaves his wallet in an abandoned money bag. Multiple domestic violence calls end in arrests

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Witnesses of a car burglary assist an officer in locating the suspect. An officer investigates a fight involving a young man and a homeless gentleman. A suspect’s testimony is debunked after an eyewitness confirms that his knife wounds were self-inflicted.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S23 : E18 Spiked but Still Moving
programme.desc: A suspect refuses to stop his vehicle even after the officers spike his tires. A dispute over money results in a pregnant woman being attacked. A woman asks for officers to help her rescue cats from a trailer.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An officer assists with a burglary call at a mall jeweler. An officer responds to a domestic dispute call involving two newlyweds at a Las Vegas motel. An accident occurs during a routine traffic stop.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers in Las Vegas make an arrest in a grand theft auto call with the help of the K9 unit. An uncooperative driver takes off in the middle of a traffic stop. A woman in Florida is rewarded for her honesty and is let go as her friends are arrested.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A suspect is arrested after officers find a loaded gun during a routine search. Two men are detained after suspected of battery. Officers arrest a man pick-pocketing during Mardi Gras.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An arrest is made in a buy-bust sting operation. An elderly man is questioned after reportedly kicking a juvenile in the face. A man is shot in the head by his roommate.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S26 : E02 Who Let the Dogs Out
programme.desc: Officers deploy a police K-9 when a burglary suspect takes refuge in a lemon tree. A suspect on the run seeks shelter in a stranger’s house. A biker with a suspended license just doesn’t know how to listen.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A patrolman plays linebacker when a fleeing thief runs right into him. Armed-robbery victims give a colorful play-by-play on surveillance footage of the crime. Officers have to get tearful children back to their estranged mother.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A stolen vehicle pursuit ends in a take down and recovery of additional evidence. A store employee flags down an officer who steps in to make a theft related arrest. An officer is accompanied by several units in pursuit of a stolen vehicle.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers respond to an assault call which escalates to car chase and the eventual arrest of two suspects. Officers spot a known drug dealer who uses a troubling method to conceal his narcotics. An officer curbs a heckler outside a popular bar.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A man throws out his narcotics during a foot-chase with police. A woman is arrested for possession of drug paraphernalia. Officers call for back-up after a woman is held at knife-point.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S19 : E15 Abandonment of a Trailer
programme.desc: A dangerous high speed motorcycle chase ends in a wreck and a subsequent arrest. A Florida woman is pulled over in a routine traffic stop and is rewarded for her cooperation. A sheriff creates harmony between a quarreling couple at a mobile park.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S23 : E01 Ignorance is an Excuse
programme.desc: Two men engage in a fist fight on the street over an alleged robbery. A couple claims that they didn’t know the car they are driving is stolen. Occupants of a vehicle claim that all of the contraband found in their car is medical equipment.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Deputies respond to a call of a man shooting a gun in his front yard. Officers are called to a domestic dispute over a wrinkly infant’s shirt. Four armed and suspicious men are spotted by deputies.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers are called to a burglary at a warehouse housing expensive items. Police are called to the scene of a threatening man with a knife. Officers thwart an attempted suicide during a traffic stop.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A suspect goes out to get his haircut and winds up in jail. Officers try to piece together a puzzling street fight between a boxer and his confused friend. Cops give a suspect every chance to admit to his obvious crime.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S26 : E16 We Run the Show
programme.desc: A stealthy robbery suspect leads officers on a chase through backyards. After dropping a bag of meth, a man swears he’s only seen the drug on TV. A doped-up domestic violence suspect tries to claim self-defense.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A high speed chase comes to a halt in a residential area and the driver is taken in for sobriety testing. A suspicious vehicle takes off as an officer approaches and a high speed chase ensues. An officer pulls over a vehicle belonging to a battery suspect who attempts to eat evidence.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An officer arrests a driver who attempts to swallow drugs stashed in his mouth. An officer arrests a repeated drug offender in an area notorious for drug trafficking. An officer pulls over an unlicensed woman driver who is arrested for providing falsified identification.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S27 : E28 Tell it to My Wife
programme.desc: A man’s wife can’t help him stay out of jail no matter how much he calls for her. One thief tries to give back his stolen loot. When approached by officers, a woman goes from passed out to out of control.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S14 : E24 I’m With You Guys
programme.desc: A man involved in a drug deal claims he works for the task force. An irate woman slams the front door when Officers arrive. Police pull over two young suspects in an area known for drug activity.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers are called to a restaurant after the owner is held at gunpoint. Police respond to a woman being sexually harassed in a park. A drunk man tells police he is going to buy a lighthouse.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A white-knuckled police chase ends in a dramatic escape and an unsettling officer injury. A woman spots an intoxicated prowler in a tree. Officers bring in the K-9 unit to sniff out a suspicious van.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A woman claims a man abused her then put a curse on her. Police arrest a man for having illegal drugs on him. An elderly woman locks herself in the restroom at a bank.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An ex-felon threatens to kill his spouse after she announces she want to divorce him. A driver is stopped with suspicious plants in her car. A woman crashes her friends truck into a pedestrian and a tree.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An officer poses as a prostitute in an attempt to attract “johns”. A suspect flees on foot through the woods following an assault. An officer investigates a local bar known for illegal activity.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Deputies assist border patrol in pursuit of a vehicle that has blown checkpoint and its tires. A drunk woman is pulled over not knowing she is missing a tire.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A speedy suspect makes officers chase him through a creek. A teenage Good Samaritan gets in the middle of a bizarre domestic dispute. After a woman destroys her home, she begs police to arrest her.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A fleeing vehicle goes for a spin when officers execute a perfect PIT maneuver. Cops try to flush out a suspect who barricades himself inside a donut shop. Officers hit the meth mother lode when they stop a truck in a downpour.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers pursue two suspects who were believed to have been involved in a robbery. Police attend to a man who has injected a concerning amount of methamphetamine. Officers break up a fight in progress involving two men outside a convenience store.

programme.title: Simon Bates' Rock Ballads! 1970-79
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Simon Bates' Rock Ballads! 1970-79

programme.title: Simon Bates 70s Pop! Top 50
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Simon Bates 70s Pop! Top 50
programme.desc: Simon Bates with a celebration of a decade - the 50 biggest pure pop hits of the 70s. He's got a bucketload of Boney M, oodles of the Osmonds & an armful of Abba!

programme.title: 1970 Unleashed!
programme.desc: Classic hits from just 1 year - 1970!

programme.title: Blimey! Wasn't It Bigger? 1970-79
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Blimey! Wasn't It Bigger? 1970-79
programme.desc: Every one of these great songs is a classic. Yet none of them ever made the Top 10 in the 70s, despite being from superstars like Bowie, Abba, The Who and more. You'll be shocked!

programme.title: Timewarp TV! 1977

programme.title: Mark Goodier's No.1s of 1977
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Mark Goodier's No.1s of 1977
programme.desc: 60 minutes of back to back number 1s from 1977 - a year when David Soul & disco were kings! With Mr Charts himself - Mark Goodier.

programme.title: Every Number 2 of 1977
programme.desc: Runners-up from the UK charts in 1977 - those 11 songs that didn't quite mae it & got stuck behind long running chart toppers from Abba, Donna Summer, Elvis Presley & Wings.

programme.title: Chinese Take Out
programme.desc: Skip the delivery fees, service charges, and long wait times with Frankie’s takeout favorites.

programme.title: New Years Party
programme.desc: Ring in the new year right with these classy and easy to make dishes.

programme.title: Summer BBQ
programme.desc: It's time for some summer fun! Don't worry, we got you covered with some of the best Summertime BBQ around.

programme.title: Grill It Up
programme.desc: From side to main dishes, we're going to show you our favorite recipes to make using your backyard BBQ.

programme.title: A Trip to Latin America
programme.desc: Bring your passport, we're heading to Latin America! Let's explore some dishes with a unique Latin flair!

programme.title: Party Time Favorites
programme.desc: Whether it's the big game or a fancy dinner party, we have the recipes you can make when it's time to host!

programme.title: Southern Home Cooking
programme.desc: Today, we're going on a trip down south for a taste of some country home cooking!

programme.title: Cheese!
programme.desc: Today, it's all about cheese. We'll showcase recipes featuring cheese in all forms. It's time to get cheesy.

programme.title: Mediterranean Meals
programme.desc: We're going on an adventure to the Mediterranean to find the best recipes from all over this coastal region!

programme.title: Dessert Delights
programme.desc: This episode is all about dessert delights! Whether it's made from chocolate or a fruit, we've got them all!

programme.title: Restaurant-Style Whole Roast Fish
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Chef Dale grills to impress with a fancy-looking yet easy-to-make whole roasted fish with watermelon salad.

programme.title: Grill These Sandwiches
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Derrell Smith joins Dale Talde as they grill up a Salmon Reuben, a Meatball Banh Mi, and even a frozen treat.

programme.title: Apocalypse Burgers
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde kicks off summer with a burger blowout featuring Brisket, Shrimp, and Lamb Burgers.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Chef Dale grills up a Mediterranean-inspired feast of beef and shrimp kabobs with tomatoes and pita.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Chef Dale creates a showstopping brunch featuring his dutch baby pancake with tangerine maple syrup.

programme.desc: Chef Dale makes vegetables the main course with savory trumpet mushrooms and spicy ssam jang eggplant.

programme.title: Saved By The Bowl
programme.desc: Spare your weekly spending allowance by recreating your favorite takeout bowls at home.

programme.title: Crunchy & Colorful Chicken Bowl
programme.desc: Chef Daisy Ryan is creating layers of amazing flavor and making one epic chicken and rice bowl meal!

programme.title: Savory Spring Prawns & Sweet Peas
programme.desc: Brad Miller is sharing the secrets of his Lemon Tarragon Prawns and Creamy Sweet Pea Risotto.

programme.title: Chinese Take Out
programme.desc: Skip the delivery fees, service charges, and long wait times with Frankie’s takeout favorites.

programme.title: New Years Party

programme.title: Veggies Veggies Everywhere
programme.desc: Today, we'll be showing you how to use green veggies in every meal, including snacks!

programme.title: Asian Fusion
programme.desc: From Japan, India, Korea, and Thailand, we're showing off our favorite Asian Fusion options from each country.

programme.title: Viva La Mexico
programme.desc: Let's explore cool cuisines from Mexico. From traditional breakfasts, to dinners and everything in between.

programme.title: Pizza Time
programme.desc: Today we've got pizza all day for you: in the morning, in the evening, literally any time you want!

programme.title: Crock Pots and Steamers
programme.desc: Today, we'll be checking out some incredible recipes that can be made in a crock pot or a steamer!

programme.title: European Adventure
programme.desc: Today, we'll be visiting the United Kingdom, Germany, France, and Greece to check out their culinary wonders.

programme.title: Surprisingly Simple Italian Steak
programme.desc: Chef Daniele Uditi shows us how surprisingly simple Italian food can be with his recipes.

programme.title: Filipino Home Cooking
programme.desc: Chef Charles Olalia is getting personal and sharing his favorite home style recipes from the Philippines.

programme.title: Party for Pennies
programme.desc: Frankie makes three dishes for a party of four. Then, it's a taco party for five people for only $20!

programme.title: Food Back from the Dead
programme.desc: Stale bread, old bananas, canned food, dry foods...Frankie shows you this is not the end of them yet!

programme.desc: Frankie shows you how to prep nostalgic old school dishes and portable wraps at home for easy, peasey lunches.

programme.title: Bacon My Heart
programme.desc: Three versatile items - bacon, eggs, and a whole chicken - will feed you a plethora of delicious cheap meals.

programme.title: Instant Gratification
programme.desc: Endlessly versatile, cheap, and super filling - everyone loves carbs!

programme.title: Cauliflower's Star Power
programme.desc: Frankie makes unexpected dishes with cauliflower and also three delicious recipes with a big chuck roast.

programme.title: Eggscellent Techniques
programme.desc: Learn Frankie’s techniques and tricks for making your favorite egg dishes just the way you like them.

programme.title: Vintage

programme.title: Struggle Sandwich
programme.desc: Every layer counts as Frankie ups the ante on classic sandwiches, with homemade twists that steal the show.

programme.title: Cabbage, cabbage, cabbage

programme.title: Crunchy

programme.title: Simplicity vs. Splendor on the Seaside
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: Soaking in the beauty and elegance of the French Riviera, Marko and Alex are in Nice to enjoy the simplicity and splendor of this seaside city.

programme.title: Keep Austin Weird
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: In the state capital of Texas, Marko and Alex see what Austin has to offer. An eclectic city known for its music and cuisine, the guys brave the Texas heat and check out what keeps Austin weird.

programme.title: Levels of Luxury in Laos
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: Sandwiched between Thailand, Vietnam, and Cambodia, Laos is a destination often overlooked by tourists. Marko and Alex are uncovering the hidden gem of Vientiane, the capital city, to see what goes on in this sleepy town beside the Mekong River.

programme.title: The Gainful Grace of Geneva
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: Marko and Alex find themselves in the prosperous and pristine city of Geneva, Switzerland. A city nestled alongside a beautiful glacier-fed lake, the guys will explore the riches Geneva has to offer.

programme.title: The Thriving Traditions of Taipei
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: Welcome to the buzzing capital of Taiwan. A rich blend of cultures, old meets new in this thriving metropolis of Taipei. Marko and Alex eat their way through the city, experiencing some unique traditions along the way.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: Marko and Alex head to Lyon, France, a city known for its gastronomy and endless history.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost

programme.title: The L.A. Lifestyle

programme.title: Backpack Serbia

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Xplore Bulgaria Sunny Beach
programme.desc: Luxurious hotels, thrilling water parks, inexpensive food and almost 300 days of bright sunny weather make Bulgaria’s biggest seaside resort, Sunny Beach popular for budget beach getaways. Catriona, however, stumbles onto the historic town of Nessebar, which is over 3000 years old, and realizes that there is more to the place than meets the eye. She goes on to visit the Castra Rubra winery, where she finds out about the history of Viticulture in Bulgaria and the process of wine making.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.desc: Benafsha embarks on a whirlwind adventure in Ahmedabad. With just 48 hours in the city, she is determined to make the most of it, but how?

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Food Fact Fun The Hague, Netherlands
programme.desc: From exploring a vintage car museum to scaling a 5 meter ice-wall and sampling a rich bread cookie, Watch Alex exploring The Hague, also known as the “International city of peace”.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: A modern European oil city built on the back of a rich maritime heritage, Aberdeen is the energetic kingpin of northeast Scotland. While the boom times may come and go, the dynamic coastal metropolis never ceases to thrill with its free museums, outdoor adventures and natural attractions right on the city’s doorstep.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.desc: Heather explores Požarevac and visits the ancient town of Viminacium. Later visits National Museum, concluding with Majdanpek’s Rajkova Pecina Caves.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Boarding Pass Rovaniemi, Finland
programme.desc: Emeline Nsingi Nkosi goes to Rovaniemi, where she visits a husky farm and finds out about about breeding and raising huskies.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.desc: For the people of Sofia, preserving its heritage is sacrosanct, and this can be seen in the way the city's infrastructure is built around its archeological treasures. Catriona realizes this when she roams around the cobblestone streets of the city. With every monument she visits, she finds herself transported to a different era, right from Perperikon fort, which narrate stories of the Byzantine empire, to Boyana church, which is home to some of the earliest examples of medieval artwork.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Great World Hotels, Four Seasons 1(Eng)
programme.desc: From lazing in hammocks by the beach to sipping drinks on a private yacht, Kim realizes that Maldives is the perfect destination to unwind in style.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Food Fact Fun Rotterdam, Netherlands
programme.desc: From trying dishes like Stroopwafel and Palat Stoofvlees to visiting the Erasmus bridge, cube houses and wall painting on the streets, Alex explores Rotterdam.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: Since medieval times Aberdeenshire and its northwestern neighbour Moray have been the richest and most fertile regions of the Highlands. Aberdeenshire is famed for its Aberdeen Angus beef cattle, its many fine castles and the prosperous 'granite city' of Aberdeen.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.desc: Explore Majdanpek with our host as the city brings the viewers closer to the treasures strewn across the Serbian countryside.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Boarding Pass Levi, Finland
programme.desc: Levi is Finland's largest and fastest-growing ski destination. Emeline is here, to find out the exciting activities that Levi offers, in summer.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.desc: With snow-capped peaks rising over primeval forests and traditional villages, Paro is like an Oriental Switzerland. On a visit to Paro, Radhika explores famous monasteries such as the Rinpung Dzong and Takstang Monastery, and learns the history and legends associated with them. Along the way, she finds out the secrets to the quintessential Bhutanese peace and contentment.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Great World Hotels, Four Seasons 2(Eng)
programme.desc: An invigorating spa treatment, a cooking lesson, a snorkeling session – Kim has experiences in the Maldives that leave her completely rejuvenated.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E14 Food Fact Fun Utrecht, Netherlands
programme.desc: From trying Orange zest beer and traditional Dutch dishes to exploring St.Martin's Cathedral, Dom Tower and enjoying go karting and stand up paddle boat ride, watch Alex enjoy his trip in Utrecht.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: In the enchanting landscapes of Inverness, Robbie’s journey takes a whimsical turn: from eccentric to downright magical.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.desc: Heather explores Nis,one of the oldest cities in Europe.She visits a concentration camp and later paraglides to end by watching a musical performance.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Boarding Pass Ruka Kuusamo, Finland
programme.desc: Emeline goes to Ruka-Kuusamo, where she tries river rafting. She also meets a reindeer herder,who tells her about the unique ways of herding reindeer.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.desc: Actress and travel enthusiast, Radhika Bangia explores the enigma that is Bhutan, when she visits Thimpu, the capital city with no traffic lights and no skyscrapers invading the skyline. Here, she checks out significant sights such as the Tibetan-style National Memorial Chorten, the National Library and the Folk Heritage Museum in order to understand more about the beliefs, history, architecture and cuisine of Bhutan.

programme.title: World Heritage
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 World Heritage Ancient Temples of Egypt, Egypt (ENG)
programme.desc: Explore the ancient heritage sites of Abu Simbel, the Philae complex of Nubia and the Hatshepsut Temple to unravel the mystical stories behind the ancient temples of Egypt.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 Food Fact Fun Gouda, Netherlands
programme.desc: Alex tries traditional Dutch food in Leiden, learns about Dutch history at Prinsenhof Museum, visits a Gothic church, a local cheese market and Delftware factory at Gouda.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 10 Days Scotland Isle Of Skye (ENG)
programme.desc: The grand finale of Robbie’s wild homecoming unfolds amidst the rugged beauty of the Isle of Skye.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E31 Backpack Resavsk Pecina, Serbia
programme.desc: Continue exploring Serbia with Heather as she visits the Manasija monastery, Resavska caves, ending with a joyride onboard Eight of Sargan rail line.

programme.title: With Love From Mauritius
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 With Love From Mauritius Ep 1
programme.desc: Krisann and Nathan’s vacation in Mauritius begins in Le Morne, where an unexpected adventure awaits the latter.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.desc: Known as Druk Yul or the “Land of the Thunder Dragon”, Bhutan is the country of mountains, monasteries and mystery. Radhika Bangia finds this to be true when she visits Punakha, the former capital of Bhutan, where she marvels at the architecture of Punakha Dzong and gets to know the story behind the two rivers, Mo Chhu and Po Chhu. She also explores the sacred temples and Mebar Tsho lake of Bumthang, the religious heart of Bhutan, and gets to know the local legends.

programme.title: World Spas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 World Spas Kempenki, Jordan (ENG)
programme.desc: Jamie Srubis tries out spa treatments, which are inspired by the Dead Sea and the desert surroundings at Hotel Kempinski Ishtar in Jordan.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Food Fact Fun Dubai 1
programme.desc: After Burj Khalifa, Alex has a traditional Emirati platter, visits the gold market and skiing rink, and goes for a camel safari and camping.

programme.title: City break
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 City Breaks Innsbruck, Austria
programme.desc: Nestled in the mighty Alps, tour the Austrian city of Innsbruck with Sabrina and explore a town that’s alpine-urban yet traditional in nature.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.desc: In her final leg of journey, Heather visits the Uvac canyon, tries locally prepared pie, ending with Kopaonik National Park and Jelovarnik waterfalls.

programme.title: With Love From Mauritius
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 With Love From Mauritius Ep 2
programme.desc: On an island-hopping adventure in Mauritius, Krisann and Nathan find out that time works differently on these islands.

programme.title: XP Guide
programme.sub-title: S01 : E26 XP Guide Copenhagen, Denmark
programme.desc: A homely place where the aroma of freshly baked bread greets you as people smoothly glide along on their bicycles. Welcome to Copenhagen.

programme.title: Unwind
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Unwind Hotel Oriole, Sri Lanka
programme.desc: Indeya explores the Cinnamon plantations, tries a local dish and witnesses a traditional dance performance.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Food Fact Fun Dubai 2
programme.desc: Alex has varied experiences in Dubai like trying Lebanese cheese bread, visiting a coffee museum, going to IMG Worlds of Adventure and more.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Food Fact Fun Amsterdam, Netherlands
programme.desc: In Amsterdam, Alex tries Bitterballen, cannabis cake and visits Heineken Experience brewery. He explores Zaanse Schans village with windmills and Coster Diamonds, the oldest diamond polishing factory.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: Robbie’s journey to reconnect with his Scottish roots begins in Edinburgh, the stunning capital city perched on extinct volcanoes. Navigating the twists of the Royal Mile, strutting around the majestic Edinburgh castle and learning to sip scotch like a true Scotsman, he feels a tad closer to his heritage. The real fun kicks in, however, when he stumbles onto a rather flamboyant way to unleash his inner Highlander.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.desc: Like Rome, Plovdiv straddles seven hills; but as Europe’s oldest continuously inhabited city, it’s far more ancient. As Catriona takes a tour of the city to see its iconic attractions such as a Roman Amphitheatre, which was once the setting for gladiator fights, and the striking Baroque Saints Constantine and Helena Church, she begins to see how seamlessly modern life blends with the age-old ruins. Along the way, she realizes why Plovdiv is called the ‘Eternal City’ of Bulgaria.

programme.desc: Stockholm, the capital and largest city of Sweden, was built on 14 Islands. This place is also sometimes referred as Venice of the north.

programme.title: BACK TO NORMAL
programme.desc: For Ian Mitchard jumping out of airplanes and soaring above the earth with a nylon canopy is as normal as walking through the grocery store. But when a dramatic accident put the lifestyle he loves in jeopardy, Ian is forced to grapple with his body.

programme.title: Cape Epic 2021 - Stage 6
programme.desc: The Absa Cape Epic is the world's premier mountain bike stage race. The route changes every year and takes ambitious amateur and professional mountain bikers from all over the world over 650 untamed kilometres through pristine landscapes.

programme.title: Cape Epic 2021 - Stage 7
programme.desc: The Absa Cape Epic is the world's premier mountain bike stage race. The route changes every year and takes ambitious amateur and professional mountain bikers from all over the world over 650 untamed kilometres through pristine landscapes.

programme.title: Alaska or Bus´t - Profile Andrew Taylor
programme.desc: Alaska, one of the most sparsely populated areas in the world, has always been a dream-riding destination for American mountain biker Andrew Taylor. But being over 3,000 miles away from his hometown, it seemed a bit too far to just jump in the truck and go.

programme.title: FIA - Pure Motorsport "Documentary | The Restart"
programme.desc: Covid-19 brought the world of motorsport to a complete standstill. However, this standstill was overcome through the joint effort and passion of volunteers, promoters, teams, drivers and FIA officials. They managed the successful RESTART.

programme.title: Vendée Globe - LIVE Part 2
programme.desc: The Vendée Globe aims to use the media impact of the event to raise public awareness of ocean conservation throughout the round-the-world race. They are direct witnesses to the changes underway, particularly around Antarctica, a region that is under particular threat.

programme.title: Cape Epic 2022 - Prolog
programme.desc: The Absa Cape Epic is the world's premier mountain bike stage race. The route changes every year and takes ambitious amateur and professional mountain bikers from all over the world over 650 untamed kilometres through pristine landscapes.

programme.title: Cape Epic 2022 - Prolog
programme.desc: The Absa Cape Epic is the world's premier mountain bike stage race. The route changes every year and takes ambitious amateur and professional mountain bikers from all over the world over 650 untamed kilometres through pristine landscapes.

programme.title: Cape Epic 2022 - Stage 1
programme.desc: The Absa Cape Epic is the world's premier mountain bike stage race. The route changes every year and takes ambitious amateur and professional mountain bikers from all over the world over 650 untamed kilometres through pristine landscapes.

programme.title: WOF 2025 #19: ABSA Cape Epic Series - Episode 1
programme.desc: The Absa Cape Epic is known as one of the toughest mountain bike stage races in the world and pushes riders to their physical and mental limits. The first three stages set the tone for the entire race.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2020 - #3 Andorra
programme.desc: The third part of the FWT 2020 will take place in Andorra. The Freeride World Tour is a worldwide competition of freeride snowboarding and skiing, where the best riders in the world compete against each other.

programme.title: King of the Court Crown Series 2022 - Hamburg (GER)
programme.desc: The King of the Court Crown Series 2022 will be unprecedented. Five tournaments, a total of four continents visited and millions of fans from all over the globe that can experience the best beach volleyball action ever seen!

programme.title: E-Bike World Tour 2022 - Tignes & Val d’Isère (FRA)
programme.desc: As the second stop of the 2022 E-Bike World Tour, the UCI-accredited E-Tour de Haute-Tarentaise attracted professional and experienced amateur riders from different nations for two days of sublime stage racing across 85km of high alpine terrain.

programme.title: Red Bull Romaniacs 2022 (ROU)
programme.desc: The Red Bull Romaniacs Extreme Enduro Rally was created in 2004 and takes place for the 19th time this year. The race is spread over five days, the first being the inner-city prologue in front of thousands of enthusiastic fans.

programme.title: SSL Gold Cup
programme.desc: Final Series 2023 - World Class Sailing - SSL Gold Cup 2023Der SSL Gold Cup ist eine spannende Ausscheidungsserie und wird auf den Kanarischen Inseln ausgetragen. Die 24 besten Nationen der SSL-Rangliste und 16 Nationen aus der Qualifikationsserie nehmen daran teil.

programme.title: WHY WE FLY
programme.desc: Ever wondered what goes through someone’s mind as they jump from a helicopter above the Canadian Rockies? Then ride along with the Team KAVU athletes as they wingsuit, skydive, and speedride above scenic Fernie, British Columbia.

programme.title: Reconnect Two - USA
programme.desc: Today we continue our North American Odyssey with Sarka Pancochova and Cheryl Maas in Reconnect Two. From Mt Baker and the legendary Bank Slalom to backcountry kickers in Bend get ready for the full Pacific Northwest snowboard experience.

programme.title: One Water Race 2024
programme.desc: The concept is straight forward; starting at Arholma in the north, the first to reach Landsort in the south is crowned the winner. Running and swimming the only method of movement. No track and free choice of route but with some unknown check points needed to pass along the way.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2020 - #1 Japan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Freeride World Tour 2020 "Live Summary"
programme.desc: The season kick-off of the world’s most important freeride series for skiers and snowboarders will be held at Hakuba (JPN).

programme.title: Outdoorsportsteam Paragliding - The Dream of Flight
programme.desc: We take you into the sky and accompany a paragliding virtuoso to the Mont Blanc massif, the Atacama Desert in Chile and the Greek island of Santorini. Follow French paraglider pilot Jean-Baptiste Chandelier.

programme.title: Dani Arnold - Ice Climbing at Lake Baikal
programme.desc: Swiss extreme sportsman Dani Arnold went on a challenging expedition to the deepest lake on earth - Lake Baikal. The Siberian winter provided accordingly difficult and fascinating conditions.

programme.title: X-Project 2.0

programme.title: Emocean - Surf Documentary - Part 2
programme.desc: Today we will listen to some intimate stories of extraordinary people literally living IN and WITH the ocean. We´ll visit some of the most terrifying and beautiful waves around the globe.

programme.title: Pasko the Magic Move
programme.desc: Recovering from testicular cancer, professional athlete and filmmaker Maarten Molenaar embarks on a journey to Fuerteventura to learn a new freestyle windsurfing trick - the Pasko.

programme.title: 5 Peaks in One Day - Mountaineering
programme.desc: Zermatt, Switzerland - Swiss alpinist Andreas Steindl (26) has accomplished what most people deem impossible: he ran 30.66 kilometres from Zermatt to Saas Fee crossing five 4000m peaks. in only 7 hours, 45 minutes and 44 seconds.

programme.title: Qatar Airways GKA - Best of Big Air Kite World Championships
programme.desc: Welcome to the Qatar Airways GKA Bite Big Air World Tour! This thrilling season takes us to two breathtaking locations: the vibrant coastal town of Barcarès, France, and the stunning shores of Salinas de Tenefé in Spain. Get ready for the world's top kiteboarders!

programme.title: Copa Kitley GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup 2024 – Cauipe (BRA) – Overall Highlights

programme.title: Beni SpeedTransalp

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 1, Norway
programme.desc: Across seven rivers, through mountains and forests, 12 strongmen go to toughest places to find out who is strongest Viking in the World and open a new season of Strongman champions league for 2015. Events like the Hercules Hold, Yoke Race and pulling a real Viking ship are some of the ingredients of this fantastic show.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 2, Germany
programme.desc: The second stage of Strongman champions league will be hosted in Germany, by FIBO - the leading international trade show for fitness, wellness and health worldwide with 300,000 visitors in four days. Special implements like the biggest log in the world or the special Bavarian stone lift are not only a challenge, but also an opportunity for new personal, national and world records.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 3, Holland
programme.desc: Holland is hosting 12 different countries with 14 of the strongest men in the world for the third stage of the Strongman Champions League.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 4, Finland
programme.desc: Zydrunas Savickas, one of strongest people on earth is in this competition which has attracted the attention of the audience in the battle for the title of strongest man in Finland. The next round of SCL is in Bulgaria.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 5, Bulgaria
programme.desc: The next stage of the competition is in Bulgaria where Ervin Katona (SCL World Champion 2012) will compete for the last time.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 6, Latvia
programme.desc: Krzysztof Radzikowski, the leader in the league will fight hard to keep Dainis Zageris off from the title and to gather another 25 ranking points in this next stage in Latvia.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 7, Croatia
programme.desc: The competition sees a close battle with a new world record in overhead dumbbell and close finishes throughout the day. This stage is in Croatia, in a city over 1700 years old, steeped in Roman tradition and history, the athletes arrive for the truck pull after a picturesque boat ride on the Adriatic Sea.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 8, Poland
